about_the_game:
Become Your Worst Nightmare's Worst Nightmare


Dash, hack, slash, and shoot your way through a variety of baddies and bosses.



Collect dozens of items, from beehives and balloons, to scarecrows and swords.

Choose upgrades to modify your abilities and items as you craft the perfect build.



Unlock a colorful cast of playable characters, each with unique abilities and strengths.



Progress through dozens of escalating difficulty levels, choosing the modifiers that best suit your playstyle.

Demo


Demo features 4 playable characters and half of the items and worlds in the full game.
detailed_description:
Become Your Worst Nightmare's Worst Nightmare


Dash, hack, slash, and shoot your way through a variety of baddies and bosses.



Collect dozens of items, from beehives and balloons, to scarecrows and swords.

Choose upgrades to modify your abilities and items as you craft the perfect build.



Unlock a colorful cast of playable characters, each with unique abilities and strengths.



Progress through dozens of escalating difficulty levels, choosing the modifiers that best suit your playstyle.

Demo


Demo features 4 playable characters and half of the items and worlds in the full game.
name: I'm Not Sleepy Demo
short_description: In this top-down roguelike, you play a child fighting to wake up from a bad dream. Battle hordes of monsters, collect tons of items, and carefully select synergistic upgrades in order to defeat your foes. Unlock new characters and difficulty modifiers in your quest to conquer your wildest dreams!
